Description: Philly Shipyard ASA is a Norway-based holding company with headquarters in Oslo, Norway, and an U.S. operating subsidiary, Philly Shipyard, Inc in Philadelphia, PA. Philly Shipyard is a shipbuilder that is presently pursuing a mix of commercial and government work. It possesses a shipbuilding facility and is a provider of ocean-going merchant vessels with a track record of delivering ships. Philly Shipyard ASA is committed to maintaining an open and direct dialogue with its shareholders, potential investors, analysts, brokers and the financial community in general. Philly Shipyard has one business segment which is building and repairing vessels for both the U.S. Jones Act market and the U.S. Government.
